name: Captain Pixel Vs The Round Invaders
name_original: Captain Pixel Vs The Round Invaders
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 39 Theme: Running Out Of Power

It was another (mostly) peaceful day on planet earth when they arrived…
There was no warning, no hint of friendly intent.
No human they encountered was left alive.
They worshiped a being beyond human comprehension.
The circle.
To create the perfect circle they drained the life of every human being they could find.
They destroyed our houses and built completely round ones instead.
But…
Even in this darkest of times
Mankind has not lost it’s hope.
For they have a hero who will smite these eldritch beings.
A hero born from the only shape that matters: the square.
His name is Captain Pixel.

Controls:

W, A, S, DMovementMouseAttackHHelp (you should look at it)

Credits:
